amendment.description: Amendment provides technical and clarifying changes to the bill; extends the termination date of the Towing Safety Advisory Committee until October 1, 2000; expresses the sense of Congress on Coast Guard funding; conveys several Coast Guard lighthouses and other Coast Guard property to local communities; and provides waivers of vessel documentation restrictions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of several amendments to make technical corrections in the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coble amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
